open_spaces_details.description: The proposal relates to landscaping, please see submitted plans

subdivision_of_building: No buildings are on the site currently
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | This temporary permission shall be for a limited period of 5 years from the date of this permission when the proposed use hereby approved shall be ceased.
Reason: To ensure that the use is temporary in nature in accordance with the permission given.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s):  DR-100 Rev E (Customer Journey Enhancements Eastern Access), Planning Statement - Application for Temporary Landscaping Works at The Eastern Access dated November 2023.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| Following completion of the proposed soft landscaping features, with reference to the previous site investigation information; such as; construction work already undertaken in the area e.g. reduction of site levels, and any other relevant information (e.g. proposed soil cover and turfing).  A verification report that demonstrates the landscape areas are suitable for the proposed temporary use must be produced, and is subject to the approval in writing of the Local Planning Authority before occupation / public access of the development. The verification report submitted shall be in accordance with the latest Environment Agency guidance and industry best practice.

Reason: To ensure the land contamination issues are addressed in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2021; the London Plan 2021; Ealing Core Strategy 2012 and Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013.
description: Temporary landscaping proposals for the Eastern access of the site, including bike storage, seating area and planting for a period of up to 5 years.
